attributes.action: make all england games on free to watch on tv ever bbc itv 5 but not sky
attributes.additional_details:
i love watching england play and find it totally wrong that i may in future will have to subscribe to sky to watch england play.
This is wrong i ask the govenment to make all england games free for all if sky get there way i will never buy any england shirts scarfs elc this is sky's movement to grab as many england game as possible so fan will have no choice but to subscribe just to watch england stop this happening now
